itemReservation.title: Gear Up for Your Journey
itemReservation.policy: Sending a request means you have read and agree to the terms and conditions of borrowing the item.
itemReservation.unavailable: The item is borrowed for the time slot.
itemReservation.available: The item is available for borrowing for the time slot.
itemReservation.pending: A request have been made in this time slot to borrow the item chosen.
itemReservation.partiallyPending: A request have been made in this time slot to borrow part of the items chosen.
itemReservation.partiallyBooked: Part of the chosen items are borrowed for the time slot.
itemReservation.signatureText: By signing below, you agree to the terms and conditions of borrowing the item.
